name: InterDigital, Inc.
goal: InterDigital develops mobile and video technologies that are at the core of devices, networks, and services worldwide. We solve many of the industry's most critical and complex technical challenges, inventing solutions for more efficient broadband networks, better video delivery, and richer multimedia experiences years ahead of market deployment. InterDigital has licenses and strategic relationships with many of the world's leading technology companies. Founded in 1972, InterDigital is listed on NASDAQ and is included in the S&P MidCap 400Â® index.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Digital economy and society, Research and innovation, Trade
euInitiatives: InterDigital participates globally in activities associated with wireless communications and video research and development.  We are following the Digital Single Market agenda and telecoms standardization issues, in particular 5G issues and any other spectrum, broadband, patent or IP matters that might be considered by the EU Commission.
